about_the_game:
The Digital Extras of SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest contain a PDF artbook and a soundtrack compilation in mp3/flac format.

The artbook features a collection of beautiful art created by the Grimlore Games art team for SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest. Get a behind the scenes look on how your favorite art was transformed into a magic game moment.

The soundtrack features 17 atmospheric tracks composed by Grimlore Games inhouse composer Bastian Kieslinger in mp3 and flac format.

Enjoy the music of SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest now on your favorite music player.

Soundtrack Track List:
01 Awakening (2:22)
02 Fragments (4:24)
03 Homecoming (4:58)
04 Queen Ayelith (2:20)
05 Dark City of Cahlabrok (4:32)
06 Katras (3:13)
07 Raith Skaddar (3:12)
08 Rerah (1:44)
09 Depths of Windholme (2:59)
10 Granite Rift (2:52)
11 Abyss (3:05)
12 Silent Hollows (3:07)
13 Kaiawu (2:36)
14 Overgrown (4:28)
15 Divinity (2:53)
16 Void (1:15)
17 Desolation (1:15)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570, AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
  • Additional Notes: Digital Extras only, System requirements above from SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB, AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
